float32.info: 0 - 1 only; actors try to maintain this fraction of crouched actors
float32.name: movement_switching_initial_crouch_chance

float32.info: seconds; how long to stay crouched before running

float32.info: seconds; how long to stay crouched before running
float32.name: movement_switching_crouch_time_to

float32.info: seconds; how long to run before moving to a crouch
float32.name: movement_switching_run_time_from

float32.info: seconds; how long to run before moving to a crouch
float32.name: movement_switching_run_time_to

float32.info: world units; only fire at targets within this distance
float32.name: ranged_combat_maximum_firing_distance

float32.info: 0 - 1 only
float32.name: ranged_combat_death_fire_wildly_chance

float32.name: ranged_combat_desired_combat_range_from

float32.name: ranged_combat_desired_combat_range_to

float32.name: ranged_combat_target_tracking

float32.info: 0 - 1 only; lead prediction accuracy
float32.name: ranged_combat_target_leading

float32.info: 0 = default; fraction of normal damage to inflict
float32.name: ranged_combat_weapon_damage_modifier

float32.info: used if WDM = 0; how much damage to inflict on target per second while firing a burst at them
float32.name: ranged_combat_damage_per_second

float32.info: aim shots super-ballistically if target is outside this range
float32.name: special_case_firing_properties_super_ballistic_range

float32.info: offset burst targets randomly by this range when firing at non-visible enemies
float32.name: special_case_firing_properties_bombardment_range

float32.info: any custom vision range this actv has
float32.name: special_case_firing_properties_modified_vision_range

enum16.info: type of special weapon fire possible
enum16.name: special_case_firing_properties_special_fire_mode

enum16.info: when to use special weapon mode
enum16.name: special_case_firing_properties_special_fire_situation

float32.info: 0 - 1 only; how likely to use this
float32.name: special_case_firing_properties_special_fire_chance

float32.info: seconds; waiting period between mode uses
float32.name: special_case_firing_properties_special_fire_delay

float32.info: world units
float32.name: berserking_and_melee_melee_range

float32.name: berserking_and_melee_berserk_melee_abort_range

enum16.info: what causes us to consider throwing a grenade
enum16.name: grenade_grenade_stimulus

int16.info: how many enemies must be within the radius of the grenade before we consider throwing it there
int16.name: grenades_minimum_enemy_count

float32.info: world units; consider enemies within this radius of throw location
float32.name: grenades_enemy_radius

float32.info: world units per second; how fast to throw the grenades
float32.name: grenades_grenade_velocity

float32.info: world units; ranges within which to consider throwing grenade
float32.name: grenades_grenade_ranges_from

float32.info: world units; ranges within which to consider throwing grenade
float32.name: grenades_grenade_ranges_to

float32.info: world units; don't throw if friendlies are within this range of target
float32.name: grenades_collateral_damage_radius

float32.info: 0 - 1 only; how likely to throw a grenade
float32.name: grenades_grenade_chance

float32.info: seconds; how often to consider throwing a grenade while stimulated
float32.name: grenades_grenade_check_time

float32.info: seconds; don't throw grenade if another actor within my encounter threw one this recently
float32.name: grenades_encounter_grenade_timeout

int16.info: number of grenades that we start with
int16.name: items_grenade_count_from

int16.info: number of grenades that we start with
int16.name: items_grenade_count_to

float32.info: 0 - 1 only; how likely to NOT drop grenades, even if we still have some
float32.name: items_dont_drop_grenades_chance

float32.info: fractions of a clip, eg. 0.3 to 0.5
float32.name: items_drop_weapon_loaded_from

float32.info: fractions of a clip, eg. 0.3 to 0.5; amount of ammo loaded into the weapon that drops
float32.name: items_drop_weapon_loaded_to

int16.info: total ammo in the dropped weapon
int16.name: items_drop_weapon_ammo_from

int16.info: total ammo in the dropped weapon
int16.name: items_drop_weapon_ammo_to

float32.info: maximum body vitality of the unit
float32.name: unit_body_vitality

float32.info: maximum shield vitality of the unit
float32.name: unit_shield_vitality

float32.info: world units; how far away we can drain the player's shields
float32.name: unit_shield_sapping_radius

int16.info: if nonzero, overrides the unit's shader permutation
int16.name: unit_force_shader_permutation
